text:
Pennsylvania: *Final* 2020 avg. #ACA exchange rate changes: 3.8% increase
Thu, 10/17/2019 - 10:20am
Back in July, the Pennsylvania Insurance Dept. posted thepreliminary/requested2020 average premium rate changes for the individual and small group markets. The ACA-compliant individual market average increase was around 4.6%; for small businesses, the average was 9.6%.
Today they finally posted theapprovedrate changes for each...and the indy market average has dropped to a 3.8% increase, while the small group market has gone up just a hair to 9.7%.
